name: My Friendly Soul
description:
Entry to Global Game Jam 2022, with the theme; Duality.

This is a puzzle game with a little horror aspects, and the main objective is escape the mansion. There is a friendly unknown ghost helping you along the journey.

One player is the human, who can interact with objects and another is the ghost, who has a better vision of the environment.

We recomend having voice comunication from the human to the ghost. And the ghost should use the Ouija board to comunicate back.

Controls

WASD: movement
Control key and Shift key: go up and down as a Ghost
Mouse: camera control
Left mouse click: as a human, interact with item and pick them (they will float in front of you, look down a little bit). Another click will use the item if possible
Right mouse click: as a human, releases the item you are holding
Tab: open and closes Ouija board
